description: This table contains a list of generic medications (MDL) that were associated with the Coordinated Care Management episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSOC_MED_PRBLM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The current generic medications associated with this Coordinated Care Management episode
